contextMenu.deletePermanentlyConfirm: Do you really want to permanently delete this file? This action cannot be undone
contextMenu.cannotAddPoster: It is not possible to add the poster if the folder is inside a compressed file, you will have to edit the file using 7-zip, unrar, etc
contextMenu.cannotDeletePoster: It is not possible to delete the poster if is inside a compressed file, you will have to edit the file using 7-zip, unrar, etc
contextMenu.setAsPosterFolders: Set image as poster of another folder
contextMenu.posterSetSuccessfully: The image has been set as poster
contextMenu.copyImageMessage: Image has been copied to clipboard
contextMenu.clearFileCacheSuccessfully: File cache has been successfully cleared

comics.continueReadingNotExists: The file saved in continue reading does not currently exist
comics.emptyIndex: There are no comics in the library
comics.emptyFolder: There is no compatible file in this folder

error.connection: Could not connect to the server
error.folderNotFound: Folder not found on the server

pages.notEnlargeMoreThanOriginalSize: Do not enlarge more than its original size
pages.forceSinglePage: Show only one page at a time
pages.onlyBlackAndWhite: Only in black and white images

music.adaptToAnimationSpeed: Adapt to the speed of animation

reading.globalZoom: Global zoom instead of image by image (Vertical reading)
reading.globalZoomSlide: Global zoom instead of image by image (Slide reading)
reading.moveZoomWithMouse: Move zoom using cursor (Disables moving by drag and drop)
reading.scrollWithMouse: Scroll by moving the cursor along the edges of the screen (Disables drag and drop scrolling)
reading.goNextPrevChapterWithScroll: Go next/previous chapter with mouse scroll (Vertical reading)
reading.turnPagesWithMouseWheel: Turn pages with mouse wheel (Zoom only with Ctrl key pressed)
reading.rotateHorizontalsAnticlockwise: When rotating horizontal images, do so counterclockwise
reading.trackingAtTheEnd: Tracking at the end of the chapter/volume

imageInterpolation.downscalingDescription: This method will only be used when the image resolution needs to be reduced, the interpolation method does not apply to PDF and EPUB or animated images
imageInterpolation.upscalingDescription: This method will only be used when the image resolution needs to be enlarged, the interpolation method does not apply to PDF, EPUB or animated images. Warning: Sharp methods can be slow on upscaling

colorProfile.forceDescription: Forces OpenComic to use a specific color profile instead of the color of the window's current monitor, as specified by the operating system. This requires restarting the app

ignoreFilesRegex.title: Ignore files and folders that match a regex or file pattern
ignoreFilesRegex.description: This is useful if you want to hide some files and folders
ignoreFilesRegex.dialogDescription: This is useful if you want to hide some files and folders, you can use a regex pattern or a file pattern. Examples:

navigation.openingBehaviorFolderDescription: Sets the desired behavior when opening folders while navigation
navigation.openingBehaviorFileDescription: Sets the desired behavior when opening files while navigation

openingBehavior.onlyLastFolder: Only in last folder (Has no subfolders)

navigation.useTheFirstImageAsPoster: Use the first image as a poster (Only if there is none currently)
navigation.showFullPathLibrary: Show full path when opening library comics
navigation.showFullPathOpened: Show full path when opening a file or folder
navigation.showLibraryPath: Show library, favorites, labels, etc in header path
navigation.recentlyOpenedItems: Number of items to save in Recently opened

saveImages.filenameTemplateDescription:
This is the default template that will be used when saving images, if there is already an image with the same name it will be saved with an incremental number.
Variables:
saveImages.autoSave: Automatically save images to this folder

startupBehavior.startOnlyFromLibrary: Only if last reading is from the library

theme.systemNightMode: Switch to night/light mode when the OS does it
theme.nightModeBlackBackground: Use black as background in night mode
theme.nightModeWhiteBlankPage: Show blank pages white in night mode

releases.checkReleases: Check if there is a new version when starting OpenComic

shortcuts.useGamepad: Use a gamepad to change the action

tapZones.invertInManga: Invert tap zones in manga reading

servers.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this server?
servers.protocolsDescription: Only connect to trusted servers and using secure protocols whenever possible
servers.name: Server name
servers.filesInSubfolders: In the library show files from subfolders

storage.cacheDescription: The thumbnails and index of the compressed files are stored here, it is not recommended to clean it unless it is very large or there is an error related to it
storage.cacheMaxSizeDescription: Files will be removed from the cache when it exceeds this size, prioritizing older unused files
storage.cacheMaxOldDescription: Files will be removed from the cache when they have not been used for more than this time
storage.temporaryFilesDescription: Here the compressed files are decompressed as they are needed, this is partially removed when closing OpenComic
storage.temporaryFilesMaxSizeDescription: Temporary files will be removed when they exceed this size, prioritizing older unused files
storage.temporaryFilesMaxOldDescription: Temporary files will be removed when they have not been used for more than this time

auth.loginAgain: Do you want to login to {{siteName}} again?

tracking.resendToken: Do you want to add the {{siteName}} token again?
tracking.setMessage: If you wish you can manually mark the chapters
tracking.setWaitMessage: You can do this now or wait for it to be automatically detected in another chapter

pages.readingConfigRemove: Are you sure you want to remove this configuration?
pages.readingConfigApplyToLabels: Auto-apply this configuration to folders/files with these labels
pages.readingConfigApplyToAllLabel: Apply this configuration to folders/files with this label
pages.readingConfigApplyToAllLabelDescription: This forces to apply this configuration to all folders/files that have the label, even if the configuration has been modified manually

labels.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this label?

opds.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this catalog?
opds.downloadDescription: Folder where files downloaded via OPDS will be saved
opds.autoSave: Automatically download files to this folder
opds.downloadSuccess: The file has been downloaded successfully

requestFileAccess.title: Access to certain files has been lost
requestFileAccess.description: You can grant permissions again from this dialog to ensure proper functioning of OpenComic

release.title: New version available {{releaseName}}
release.body: You can see the implemented changes from the {{{linkStart}}}release page{{{linkEnd}}}

uncompress.title: Error when unzipping
uncompress.message: An error occurred while trying to unzip the file.
